helpgrid.innerhtml: To view the status of crew requirements for a date, select the date in the Date field.
To display assigned work for a crew during a specific date range, select a start date and an end date.
To display the work orders that a crew worked on during a specific date range, select a start date and end date.
To display the labor and asset assignments for this crew during a specific date range, select a start date and an end date.
To display the crew assignments for this labor record during a specific date range, select a start date and an end date.
To display the crew assignments for this asset record during a specific date range, select a start date and an end date.
